yads.doi.apps
Class YADT

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--yads.doi.apps.YADT
public class YADT
extends java.lang.Object

This is YADT - Yet Another DOI Tool.

The YADT class provides a main(java.lang.String[]) method which implements a simple command line tool for querying DObjects.

Usage: java -classpath DObject.jar yads.doi.apps.YADT [options] <doi> 

  -r          : get random DOI
  -n          : print DObject as RDF/N3
  -x          : print DObject as RDF/XML

  -d          : print text dump of the DObject
  -t          : print the DObject data types
  -v          : print the DObject data values

  -h          : print this help message
  -V          : print the version number of YADT

Version:
0.1.3
Author:
Tony Hammond
